name: D for Duck
description:
This game was created during  24 nov- 26 nov at a BTH gamejam.

Instructions

  • Avoid the Humans, they will not hesitate to throw bread.
  • Put up the propaganda posters
  • Make a change for Birdkind!! 

The Team

Johan Nauclér Löfving - Progamming

Andréas Isaksson (email) - Music and sound

Heise-kun - Posters & 2d sprites

FelBeing - 3d models & scens

Music used
Clenched Teeth - Kevin MacLeod
Evil March - Kevin MacLeod
Grammophone - Kevin MacLeod
